resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

ursabot commented on pull request #12117:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12117#issuecomment-1009733881


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 540dbf6d58c4c17d772583d2516f5847ef7d34fd and contender = 123a798288b59c080a2b624384313d390ceef9d7. 123a798288b59c080a2b624384313d390ceef9d7 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/980ce27bee07462bbb2efd169fc2cfb6...e1c3a81dc86b4c5189e611fbf7d54feb/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/b8565e89bdc044ebbd907860406909db...c7900c6ecef64d1c925bfe1f57c97e20/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/2c46405c9f52458289c550b2ef3f629f...a715894ec56c4805b0a1b7c0d64a3d22/)
   Supported benchmarks:
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: Supported benchmark langs: Python. Runs only benchmarks with cloud = True
   ursa-i9-9960x: Supported benchmark langs: Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: Supported benchmark langs: C++, Java
